parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided text.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any parliamentary candidate by name or affiliation. While it mentions "Andrioni Alin" and "Păun Gabriel",  there's no indication these individuals are running for parliament in the current election.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True.  The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and the content is presented as a news report, aiming for a broad audience.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The primary objective of the post appears to be reporting on a legal case related to environmental activism and alleged defamation. There is no explicit call to vote for or against any candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>True. The post presents itself as a news report, summarizing a court case. It provides details about the case and links to a news article. While it has a clear bias, it's presented in a format resembling journalistic reporting.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses a strong opinion about the individuals involved, it does not directly advocate for or against any candidate in the parliamentary elections.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1090570509201739</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while expressing strong opinions and potentially biased reporting, does not constitute electoral propaganda under Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.  The post focuses on a legal case involving environmental activists, not on influencing the outcome of the parliamentary elections.  It lacks any direct or indirect endorsement or criticism of any parliamentary candidate. The link to the news article further supports the journalistic nature of the post.  While the post's tone is clearly partisan, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by the provided legal framework.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>RÂUL ALB</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
